issue.title: [Python] pyarrow.array should be able to yield smaller integer types without an explicit cast
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1605](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1605). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
e.g. `pyarrow.array([1, 2, 3], type='int8')`
